AboutMeSection.Title: About Me
AboutMeSection.Text1: Hello! I'm Juanjo, a full-stack web developer. I really like creating websites and working on innovative projects. Having experience in both front-end and back-end development, I specialize in front-end, where React is my framework of choice.
AboutMeSection.Text2: I consider myself quite versatile and feel comfortable working with various programming languages. I'm always open to learning new ones as necessary to stay ahead with the new technologies.

ExperienceData.description: At Talentech, I advanced from a junior front-end role to handling full-stack features. I worked with React, Next.js, and Prisma, integrating AI-driven solutions and developing custom prompts. I also contributed to building a desktop app using Electron Forge, quickly adapting to evolving project needs. The role involved constant learning as I took on new responsibilities and tackled complex problems across multiple startup projects.

I started as a trainee Front-end Web Developer at Talentech, specializing in React and Next.js. Working with flexible, task-based assignments, I quickly expanded my skills, gradually tackling more challenging tasks and taking on greater responsibilities. I progressed from building basic components to developing complete features, actively contributing to various startup projects.

As a Physical Education Teacher at a primary school during the post-pandemic period, I designed games and activities that respected social distancing guidelines. I engaged students with fun exercises focused on motor skills, teamwork, and physical activity, ensuring a safe environment that followed distancing measures.

During the pandemic, I transitioned to offering online personal training sessions, connecting with clients through video calls and virtual platforms. I led live classes for small groups, providing real-time feedback, exercise guidance, and tailored workout plans to keep participants active and motivated from home.

I designed diverse workout circuits to keep participants engaged and target different muscle groups. I provided real-time feedback to ensure proper technique and safety, and ended each session with guided stretching to promote relaxation and prevent injuries.
